post_text: We are hiring a Product Manager at Tectonic !We've built a unified platform that replaces the fragmentation plaguing modern Shopify storefronts. In just 6 months we have quickly become the growth engine behind some of the largest brands globally. We are now expanding our team and are looking for a Product Manager to help us fully productize growth for brands on our platform.If you are someone who loves to solve for consumer growth, here's your chance to not just work with large e-commerce brands across categories, but also build the Al platform to put brand growth on auto-pilot.What you'll do:‚Ä¢ Harmonize our proven growth strategies (search, recommendations, personalization, rewards, etc.) into a seamless AI-powered system.‚Ä¢ Ship new storefront features that impact hundreds of millions in sales.‚Ä¢ Own the roadmap of these features from PRD to roll-out across hundreds of brands.Who you are:‚Ä¢ 3-5 years in product management (Platform and Al/ML product experience is a bonus)‚Ä¢ Able to think from both sides: consumer psychology and platform architecture.‚Ä¢ Comfortable working with ML engineers, platform engineers, and business stakeholders.Why Tectonic:‚Ä¢ Well-funded, with a clear path to scale‚Ä¢ Unique opportunity to build both the consumer experience and the Al platform layer simultaneously‚Ä¢ Generous equity in a company building critical infrastructure for the next generation of commerce.You'll be working directly with me and Mohit Jaiswani.Location: Bangalore (in-office)Apply via the form linked in the comments
